data.title: Joaquin Phoenix Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Joaquin Phoenix with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Awards

2020BAFTA Film Awards-Best Leading Actor: winner

2020Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Drama: winner

2019Oscar-Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role: winner

2019Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by a Male Actor in a Leading Role: winner

2019Critics' Choice Awards-Best Actor: winner

2019Independent Spirit Awards-Best Male Lead: nominated

2017Cannes Film Festival-Best Actor: winner

2015Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Comedy or Musical: nominated

2015Independent Spirit Awards-Robert Altman Award: winner

2014Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Comedy or Musical: nominated

2013Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Drama: nominated

2013Critics' Choice Movie Awards-Best Actor: nominated

2013BAFTA Film Awards-Best Leading Actor: nominated

2012Venice Film Festival-Best Actor: winner

2012Los Angeles Film Critics Association-Best Actor: winner

2012Detroit Film Critics Society-Best Actor: nominated

2012Oscar-Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role: nominated

2006Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy: winner

2006Grammy-Best Compilation Soundtrack Album for a Motion Picture, Television or Other Visual Media: winner

2006Critics' Choice Awards-Best Actor: nominated

2006BAFTA Film Awards-Best Actor in a Leading Role: nominated

2005Online Film Critics Association-Best Actor: nominated

2005Chicago Film Critics Association-Best Actor: nominated

2005Oscar-Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role: nominated

2005Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by a Male Actor in a Leading Role: nominated

2004Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture: nominated

2001Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role in a Motion Picture: nominated

2001Critics' Choice Awards-Best Supporting Actor: winner

2001BAFTA Film Awards-Best Actor in a Supporting Role: nominated

2000National Board of Review-Best Supporting Actor: winner

2000Oscar-Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role: nominated

2000Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by a Male Actor in a Supporting Role: nominated

2000Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture: nominated
